mapper.select: SELECT PASS_NO, PASS_NAME, PASS_PRICE FROM PASS
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENT_LOG (PAY_LOG_NO, PAY_LOG_EMAIL, PAY_LOG_DATE, PAY_LOG_PG, PAY_LOG_NAME, PAY_LOG_PRICE) VALUES (#{merchantUid}, #{email}, SYSDATE, #{payPg}, #{ticketName}, #{price})
INSERT INTO PAYMENT_LOG (PAY_LOG_NO, PAY_LOG_EMAIL, PAY_LOG_DATE, PAY_LOG_PG, PAY_LOG_NAME, PAY_LOG_PRICE) VALUES (#{merchantUid}, #{sessionEmail}, SYSDATE, #{payPg}, #{ticketName}, #{price})
INSERT INTO PAYMENT (PAY_NO, EMAIL, PASS_NO, EXPIRATION_DATE) VALUES (PAYMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{passNo}, SYSDATE + 30)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PAYMENT WHERE SYSDATE > EXPIRATION_DATE
mapper.select: SELECT A.PAY_LOG_NO, A.PAY_LOG_EMAIL, A.PAY_LOG_NAME, A.PAY_LOG_DATE, A.PAY_LOG_PG, A.PAY_LOG_PRICE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PAY_LOG_NO DESC) AS ROW_NUM, PAY_LOG_NO, PAY_LOG_EMAIL, PAY_LOG_NAME, PAY_LOG_DATE, PAY_LOG_PG, PAY_LOG_PRICE FROM PAYMENT_LOG WHERE PAY_LOG_EMAIL = #{email}) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
